website_summaries.verdict: The comfortable build of the Skechers GOwalk Joy - Terrific gained the favor of the majority.
pros: Almost all of the owners stated that the Skechers GOwalk Joy - Terrific was extremely comfortable for all-day wear
A good number of consumers claimed that the trainer was true to size and width
The style and colorways of the shoe received praises from numerous reviewers
Plenty of testers reported that this walking shoe from Skechers was durable
The lightweight nature of the merchandise was appreciated by a couple of buyers
cons: The upper was not supportive enough, according to one user
Another person noted that the thick heel made this model look like orthopedic footgear

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Women's Go Walk
customer_reviews.text: My normal shoe size is a 5 but I purchased a size 4 1/2 as the sketchers I bought last year were far too big and they were a size 5. These sketchers are a lot better but I do not feel I have full support as they are still big but a size smaller and the length of my foot would not fit them. The best ever sketchers I have ever bought were the Gowalk 2 in 2015 and they were a size 5 and fitted perfectly but unfortunately I cannot get them in my size otherwise I would have bought them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mhairi

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They’re not the nicest looking shoe but they were bought for slipping on when I needed to just nip out, having trodden on broken glass and needed extra padding while my foot recovered. They’re so comfortable. I will be keeping my eye out for a pair in a better colour for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Sketchers each year so ordered a new pair. I put them on and went out to do the shopping before I discovered my feet were slipping in them. When I checked they were too wide and too long - at least 1 cm bigger than the same ones from last year. I thought maybe they were mens but the label said womens. So too late to send them back as I had worn them out but totally useless
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable & long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and size is accurate. I’m a 6 in everything and the 6 was a good fit, not too tight and not too big but very comfortable fit with s little room. That’s a good thing in warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: T. Peart

customer_reviews.title: Great slip ons
customer_reviews.text: I usually take a size 5 or 5 and a half. These shoes in a size 5 fit perfectly. I have washed them (with a towel) in the machine on 30 degrees. They came out looking great. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The comfort is excellent, I wish I had found them earlier than I did. I was unable to walk on gravel, stones and uneven surfaces without discomfort, but now I can. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: EUNICE

customer_reviews.title: Typical Sketchers!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked Sketchers and these are lovely. My only bug is the heal slippes a little even when i buy a half size smaller than my Norman show size.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Moo

customer_reviews.title: So light
customer_reviews.text: So light and comfy you forget you have them on, don’t want to wear anything else
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix 62

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are stylish and so comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Crawford

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love sketchers sooooooo comfortable, but I look out for the really good buy ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzs

customer_reviews.title: I have arthritis
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of skechers. All very comfortable but these are the best yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Lovely colour, very comfortable. Good support on heel and all round.
customer_reviews.author: TracyW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers, i have boots, several shoes and just love them. So comfy and like walking in slippers
customer_reviews.author: Baileyboy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe but larger than standard sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of the shoe but bigger than expected if I ordered again i’d go 1 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Sketcher
customer_reviews.text: Just love the comfort of Sketches, wear them most days for leisure wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline newy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are very comfortable, as expected. The size is a little generous, but I wear socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Love the sketchers great for walking in.Would recommend these to anyone .Pleased with my purchase. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, and great fitting
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect, straight out of box. Done plenty of walking and had no issues with them
customer_reviews.author: Mark Statham

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy fits perfectly highly reccomend if you on your feel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she said they are a great shoe so light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my wife,she said they are a great shoe so light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I love Skechers and bought a pink pair of these from the actual store for £52. When I saw these for so much less, I couldn't resist. They fit as should, squishy comfort soft soles and I can walk all day in them. Soft stretchy top material that expands with your foot, I have wide feet but these are fine in the normal width as they fit to your foot. They were delivered very quick and I would definitely buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: madge

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's Go Walk Joy-Terrific Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: Modernize your walking gear with the Skechers go walk joy™ terrific shoe. Features innovative 5Gen® midsole design and an advanced mesh fabric upper with new Skechers goga max® insole for the most advanced walking experience ever.
feature_bullets: Highly breathable lightweight and comfortable upper design.
Featherweight sockliner adapts to the foot while you walk.
Natural expansion provides a comfortable, natural fit.
Integrated outsole pattern for easy walking comfort.
